reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects a variety of data types including user-generated content (text, image, and video content), log data (IP address, device type, activity within the app, time and date), technical error data when errors occur, and personal information such as name, address, date of birth, payment details, and device technical information.

content: Log data (IP address, device type, activity within the app, time and date)
Personal information (name, address, date of birth, payment details, device technical information)

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions the collection of various data types falling under user-generated content, log data, technical error data, and personal information. These types cover a broad range of data categories collected by the app.

(GDPR) Compliance (EU)
Data Controller / Data Processor
The GDPR distinguishes between organisations that process personal information for their own purposes (known as “data controllers”) and organizations that process personal information on behalf of other organizations (known as “data processors”). We, MyNovel Inc., located at the address provided in our Contact Us section, are a Data Controller with respect to the personal information you provide to us.

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that users can withdraw their consent and opt out of data collection or delete data.
reply.reference: you give us consent to collect and use your personal information for a specific purpose. You may withdraw your consent at any time using the facilities we provide; however this will not affect any use of your information that has already taken place. When you contact us, you may consent to your name and email address being used so we can respond to your enquiry. While you may request that we delete your contact details at any time, we cannot recall any email we have already sent. If you have any further enquiries about how to withdraw your consent, please feel free to enquire using the details provided in the Contact Us section of this privacy policy. URL: https://telegra.ph/POYM---Privacy-Policy-12-21
